attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How much longer do we have to put up with silence from the Prime MInister about the behaviour of MPs within his party. If the general public behaved in such a way, they would feel the full force of the law and we expect MPs to be treated in the same way. It is time for Gordon Brown to be accountable to the British public and to make an statement about the current situation regarding those MPs who have made claims that are not morally correct.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
